name: TalkScholar
_source: s;Man3;Oh Atropos, please let House Roland's tapestry continue.
s;Anuki;Sorry to interrupt your prayer, but is everything alright?
s;Man3;Sorry, sorry.{w} You must be Lord Roland's guests.{w}{br}Is there anything you require from the library?
s;Anuki;Not really.{w} I'm just wondering about your prayer.{w}{br}What are you worried about happening to House Roland?
s;Man3;Oh, nothing at all.{w} I simply wish to celebrate his lordship's rule.{w}{br}Now, if you'll excuse me.
s;Simon;It looks like they're pretty scared of House Morrissey's arrival.
s;Anuki;I mean, Roland's troops are pretty pitiful.{w}{br}But it's not like we're mounting an attack or anything.{w}{br}I think Roland's staff just needs to calm down.
